import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-welcome', templateUrl: './welcome.component.html', styleUrls: ['./welcome.component.css'] }) export class WelcomeComponent { }

Welcome to Lake County Work Orders!

We're happy to have you here, but you probably want to check on or submit a work order.

So, choose an option below!

Meet Our Techs View/Create a Work Order
